      E computeManifold(Polygon polygon, Polygon otherPolygon, E manifold)
      Computes the collision Detection.Manifold between two Polygons.

    • Method Detail

      • computeManifold

        E computeManifold(Polygon polygon,
                  Polygon otherPolygon,
                  E manifold)

        Computes the collision Detection.Manifold between two Polygons. If there is no intersection between the given Polygons, this method returns null.

        Parameters:
        polygon - polygon.
        otherPolygon - second polygon.
        manifold - collision data container.
        Returns:
        collision manifold, or null if no collision.
